meanings.sent1: The quey frolicked in the meadow with the other calves.
meanings.sent2: The farmer's quey was born just last spring.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous quey managed to sneak into the feed shed.
meanings.sent4: The quey's innocent eyes gazed curiously at the world around her.
meanings.sent5: The quey's soft fur was a delight to touch.

meanings.definition: To make a lowing sound like a cow
meanings.sent1: The cow queyed loudly, calling out to her calf in the distance.
meanings.sent2: As the sun set, the cows queyed softly in the pasture.
meanings.sent3: The cow queyed in protest when the farmer tried to milk her too early.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the cows queying echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The cow queying in the barn signaled the end of another day.

meanings.definition: A female bovine that has not yet had a calf
meanings.sent1: The quey grazed peacefully in the field alongside the other heifers.
meanings.sent2: The farmer kept a close eye on the quey, waiting for her to give birth.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous quey managed to sneak into the feed shed.
meanings.sent4: The quey's belly was round with the promise of new life.
meanings.sent5: The quey's gentle demeanor endeared her to all who met her.
